elements.text: As you sit down to pay bills, you find it difficult to organize all the paperwork. You wonder whether this is because of your sleepless night last night, or if it could be related to HD. Your family member recommends a helpful app, and you are able to take care of the bills...

elements.name: Organizing Bills_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
